name: SkySlider
description:
Current Version: Alpha 0.31

Updates coming soon

Video

SkySlider is a simple, relaxed platformer game set in the clouds. There's the small twist that you're very slippery (as the name would suggest) so you've got to keep good control!

Contact: alexcarr1113@outlook.com

Please note this game is currently in early access so gameplay may or may not change.
